Name: Raycast for Windows
Tagline: Your shortcut to everything on Windows.
Description: Stop fighting your computer. Raycast puts everything at your fingertips. After 5 years on Mac, Raycast is now on Windows. Launch apps instantly, search files in real-time, access hundreds of extensions like GitHub or Notion, and get AI answers. All from your keyboard. Download our public beta for free and discover what frictionless work feels like.

Name: Audience Loop
Tagline: Build smarter audiences before launching ads
Topics: Email Marketing, Advertising, Social media marketing
Description: Audience Loop is an AI workspace that turns messy contact lists into clean, enriched, always-updating audiences you can launch campaigns on. Bring in data from your CRM, events, social, Shopify, website, and spreadsheets. AI agents clean, dedupe, enrich, and match your records, then keeps audiences live and synced to Meta, Google, LinkedIn, email, TTD, and more with a built-in learning loop. No complex CDP, no data wrangling just better audiences and campaigns that perform.

Name: Lamatic 3.0
Tagline: Turn Domain Expertise into Reliable Agentic Apps
Description: Lamatic 3 offers a complete reimagined approach to building Agentic Apps. We are thrilled to introduce a developer-focused Studio Refresh, a GitHub-based version control system, and environments. Additionally, we have AgentKit for quick deployment of agents and Vibe Assistants.

Name: OCR Arena
Tagline: The world's first OCR leaderboard
Description: OCR Arena is a free playground for evaluating leading VLMs and OCR models side-by-side. Upload any document, compare accuracy, and vote for the best models on a public leaderboard.

Name: Instant Heatmaps by Crazy Egg
Tagline: See where users click across your website, 100% free
Description: Free analytics that show where visitors are clicking on your website, so you can see which content gets engagement. Automatically populated for every page. Setup in minutes, then watch the data flow in.

Name: Globe of History
Tagline: Interactive 3D globe visualizing 6,000 years of history.
Description: Explore battles, philosophers, inventions and more on an interactive 3D map. Filter by era and category to see how history unfolds across the globe. Powered by a custom AI data factory. **Desktop only for now**

Name: elfmonn
Tagline: Ar storytime & vr games for kids
Topics: Android, Virtual Reality, Kids, Augmented Reality
Description: Elfmonn is a magical AR & VR app where kids enjoy elf storytime, fun tasks, and games—perfect for families and hybrid-working parents. Elfmonn natively supports SmartTV integration for Android & Apple iOS maximising engagement on the biggest screen in the home

Name: Antigravity for Raycast
Tagline: Keyboard-first control for Google Antigravity IDE
Topics: Productivity, Open Source, GitHub, Social Impact
Description: # The Problem Developers waste 15-30 seconds every time they need to: - Switch between projects - Open a file from Finder - Launch a new workspace Those seconds add up to hours per week + cognitive cost of breaking flow state. ## The Solution **Search Recent Projects** Instantly access your recently opened Antigravity projects. **Open File/Folder** Quick picker to open any file or folder directly in Antigravity. **Open New Window** Launch a fresh Antigravity window with a single command.

Name: Chime
Tagline: One alert system for all your time-sensitive items
Topics: Productivity, Task Management, Menu Bar Apps
Description: Never miss another meeting, reminder, or deadline. Chime shows full-screen impossible-to-miss alerts for Google Calendars, Outlook, Teams, Apple Reminders, Todoist, amongst others. One-click join for 30+ video platforms. Built for the busy, the distracted and the ones who relate to ADHD, useful for everyone.

Name: Good Dad
Tagline: Daily mindful parenting reminders for iOS & Android
Description: Be the father you want to be with Good Dad—a free app delivering daily reminders that keep you grounded in what matters most. Get gentle nudges about patience, presence, and connection right when you need them. Whether you're navigating rush hour traffic or tempted to scroll through your phone, Good Dad helps you pause, breathe, and show up for your kids with intention. Simple, ad-free, and built by a dad who gets it. Available now on iOS & Android.

Name: Twogether
Tagline: A shared & synced date idea list for you and your partner
Description: Twogether gives couples one shared place to save, organize and plan every date idea with instant sync across both phones. Add ideas anytime, favorite the ones you both love, and schedule dates straight from your list. And whenever you are stuck, Ask Luna, the built-in AI date assistant, helps you discover new ideas tailored to both your interests. No more forgotten notes or “what should we do” moments. Just one simple and private space to plan better dates together.

Name: Gatling Studio
Tagline: Turn browser journeys into load tests in minutes
Description: Gatling Studio is a new desktop app that converts real browser journeys into ready-to-run Gatling load tests. Record your session, clean up noise, generate structured test code, and export it to your IDE or Gatling Enterprise Edition, all in minutes.

Name: Mixup
Tagline: creative photo magic
Description: Mixup lets you create weird and wonderful photos using “recipes” — human written prompts with blanks for photos, text, and sketches. Browse the feed and remix anyone’s creation by swapping in your own stuff, or dream up a new recipe for others to play with. Some turn out beautiful. Some turn out bizarre. All are uniquely human. Behind the curtain, Mixup uses the latest and greatest generative AI tech— but it’s the people who make it shine.

Name: TurtleBar - Smart Battery Saver for Mac
Tagline: Extend your Mac's battery life with one click.
Description: A tiny macOS menu-bar app to control Power Saving Mode and automate battery-saving rules.

Name: 1UP
Tagline: Build better habits with your friends
Description: 1UP is a beautifully crafted shared Habit Journal for you and your close friends to grow together.

Name: Storiara
Tagline: AI Coordination and Budgeting for Indie Filmmakers
Description: From script to shoot, we get your story made. Cut pre-production time by 70% with smart-powered scheduling, budgeting, storyboarding, and coordination.

Name: Browser Cash
Tagline: The stealthiest browser automation platform for web scraping
Description: Browser Cash is a browser automation platform for AI agents, web scraping, and internet intelligence. One API call spins up a real browser on a real device, so your agents can browse, click, log in, and extract data like a human. No CAPTCHAs, no antibot issues, and no spoofing. Browsers run as background operations, meaning tasks can be completed independently with zero human supervision. All developers get $25 in free credits with no card required. https://browser.cash/developers

Name: Neat Photo (Beta)
Tagline: A daily photo game that teaches you to see differently.
Description: Neat Photo turns daily photography into a game. Instead of filters or passive scrolling, you get a fresh theme, a rotating AI critic with unique preferences, and just 3 shots to compete on a daily leaderboard. Every photo is graded on composition and lighting, and you can even collect objects in your photos as rare emojis. It’s intentional, playful, and built to make you a better photographer every day.

Name: AI Detector
Tagline: A lightweight and super fast AI detector that actually works
Description: The most accurate AI detector. Identify ChatGPT, Claude, and AI-generated text with 95%+ accuracy using advanced multi-algorithm analysis. Instant results, no signup.

Name: Numby
Tagline: A natural language calculator for your terminal and macOS
Description: Write calculations naturally. Store variables, keep history. Free CLI/TUI with 40+ units, 300+ currencies, offline support, 9 languages. Native macOS app available ($5.99).
